home.nice_to_meet_you: it's a pleasure to meet you üëãüèº
home.welcome:
Hi! Thank you for visiting my page and getting to know me!
Let me introduce myself and my work üöÄ

about_me.who_i_am: I am an experienced fullstack-developer and team-lead, focussed on solutions with VueJS, TypeScript and Laravel. For many years I support companies, building robust and scalable solutions.
about_me.my_experience: In the past 7+ years I contributed across many different projects, including platforms for companies like https://monkeybox.de, https://impax-tours.com and https://aedifion.com. It's my goal to provide clean code, structured processes and onholding value.
about_me.values_text: Reliability, precision and continuous learning are at the heart of my work. I value open communication and close collaboration with my clients in order to achieve the best possible results.

services.frontend_text_1: Implementation of modern and efficient web-applications and websites.
services.frontend_text_2: My deep expertise of Vue and it's ecosystem ensures that my solutions are up-to-date with state of the art technology and best practises.
services.saas_text_1: From setup & development up to release and rollout. Scalable and stable solutions for your business needs.
services.saas_text_2: Custom solutions for booking-systems, inventory management, payment gateways and API development.
services.consultancy_text_1: I offer sound advice and strategic planning for your web development projects.
services.consultancy_text_2: With my experience in front-end and back-end development and team management, I can help you make the right technological decisions and implement your projects efficiently.

titles.git_flow: Git Flow and clean work results

methods.agile: I apply agile methods like SCRUM, Kanban, or Scrumban to adapt flexibly to changes during the project and incorporate regular feedback for continuous improvement. Through short iterations and regular check-ins, I ensure that requirements stay up-to-date and actionable.
methods.ci_cd: Using CI/CD in GitHub and GitLab, I optimize the development process with automated testing and continuous deployment, ensuring code changes are securely and swiftly transferred to production. This allows me to deliver functioning software at any time while maintaining quality. Depending on the stack, I also use tools like Laravel Forge for Laravel projects.
methods.git_flow: I work with a mix of Git Flow and GitHub Flow to ensure well-structured branches for both long-term and fast-paced development cycles. I make sure branches for features, fixes, and releases are clearly separated, avoiding common mistakes like working directly on the master branch, unclear commit messages, or skipping code reviews. Best practices like regular rebasing and the use of pull requests keep the codebase clean and traceable.
methods.testing: Testing is a fundamental part of my work, which I never or rarely skip. Unit tests with TDD, component tests with Cypress for UI elements, or E2E tests to verify the core functionality of the software from A to Z ensure that the code is robust and maintainable from the start, reducing risks for future changes.
